title: Revisiting Boehmer et al. (2021): Recent Period, Alternative Method, Different Conclusions
abstract: arXiv:2403.17095v1 Announce Type: new  Abstract: We reassess Boehmer et al. (2021, BJZZ)'s seminal work on the predictive power of retail order imbalance (ROI) for future stock returns. First, we replicate their 2010-2015 analysis in the more recent 2016-2021 period. We find that the ROI's predictive power weakens significantly. Specifically, past ROI can no longer predict weekly returns on large-cap stocks, and the long-short strategy based on past ROI is no longer profitable. Second, we analyze the effect of using the alternative quote midpoint (QMP) method to identify and sign retail trades on their main conclusions. While the results based on the QMP method align with BJZZ's findings in 2010-2015, the two methods provide different conclusions in 2016-2021. Our study shows that BJZZ's original findings are sensitive to the sample period and the approach to identify ROIs.

translated_title: 重新审视Boehmer等人（2021年）：最新时期，替代方法，不同结论
translated_abstract: 我们重新评估了Boehmer等人（2021年，BJZZ）关于零售订单不平衡（ROI）对未来股票回报预测能力的开创性工作。首先，我们在更近期的2016-2021年期间复制了他们在2010-2015年的分析。我们发现ROI的预测能力显著下降。具体来说，过去的ROI不能再预测大盘股的周回报，基于过去ROI的多空策略也不再盈利。其次，我们分析了使用替代报价中点（QMP）方法来识别和标记零售交易对主要结论的影响。虽然基于QMP方法的结果与2010-2015年的BJZZ发现一致，但这两种方法在2016-2021年提供了不同的结论。我们的研究表明，BJZZ的原始发现对样本期间和识别ROI的方法敏感。
tldr: 本文重新审视了Boehmer等人（2021年）关于零售订单不平衡（ROI）对未来股票回报预测能力的开创性工作，发现这些结论对于不同样本时期和ROI识别方法是敏感的。
en_tdlr: This paper reexamines Boehmer et al. (2021)'s seminal work on the predictive power of retail order imbalance (ROI) for future stock returns, finding that these conclusions are sensitive to different sample periods and ROI identification methods.
